title: Docker development environment
description: Create docker-compose.yml with services: backend (Python + Demucs), postgres (future), redis (future). Add Dockerfile for backend with ML dependencies. Document usage in README.

title: Install project dependencies
description: Run npm install in all packages (web, desktop) and uv sync in backend to install all dependencies. Verify type-checking passes after installation.

title: Minimal UI implementation
description: Build core React components - DragDropZone, WaveformDisplay, PlaybackControls, RecentSongs, StreakIndicator, KeyboardOverlay. Dark theme, responsive layout.

title: End-to-end integration testing
description: Create full integration test: drag MP3 → backend processing → WebSocket progress → stems loaded → playback works. Use Playwright to test electron app from drag to first playback.

title: WebSocket real-time updates
description: Implement WebSocket connection for real-time stem processing progress. Connection manager, progress events, error handling, reconnection logic.

title: Drag-and-drop stem separation
description: Implement core feature - process audio files to separate stems (drums, bass, other, vocals) in <30s using Demucs ML model. Include file validation, hash-based caching, WebSocket progress updates.

title: Backend startup script and health checks
description: Create start-backend.sh script with uv run. Add comprehensive health check endpoint that verifies: Demucs model loaded, DB connected, cache dir writable, GPU/CPU available.

title: Auto-update implementation and testing
description: Implement electron-updater integration. Test update flow: check for updates, download in background, prompt user, apply update. Set up update server or use GitHub releases.

title: File caching system
description: Multi-layer cache (memory, IndexedDB, filesystem) for processed stems. SHA256 hash-based cache keys, automatic cleanup, offline support.

title: Testing infrastructure
description: Set up Vitest for unit tests, Playwright for E2E tests, test coverage reporting. Write initial test suites for core functionality.

title: Keyboard-only playback controls
description: Build keyboard shortcuts for play/pause (space), solo stems (1-4), mute stems (shift+1-4), speed control (s), loop markers ([]), navigation (arrows). Integrate with Web Audio API and Tone.js.

title: Auto-loop detection system
description: ML-based loop detection to identify difficult sections using spectral complexity, onset density, and harmonic complexity analysis with librosa. Auto-suggest 3 practice loops per song.

title: Electron security implementation
description: Implement context isolation, disable node integration, CSP headers, input sanitization, secure IPC communication.

title: Backend unit test coverage
description: Write pytest tests for: demucs_processor (mocked processing), loop_detector (algorithm correctness), routes (API contracts), websocket (connection lifecycle). Target 80%+ coverage.

title: Fix TypeScript compilation errors
description: Resolve all TS errors in web and desktop packages after npm install. Add proper type annotations, fix missing imports, remove unused variables.

title: Desktop app build and packaging
description: Test electron-builder configuration. Create signed DMG (Mac), NSIS installer (Windows), AppImage (Linux). Verify app launches and connects to backend.

title: Development environment setup script
description: Create setup-dev.sh script to install Python 3.13, uv, Node, pnpm, download ML models, setup database, create config files.

title: Security audit and hardening
description: Review: file upload validation (magic bytes), path traversal prevention, CORS configuration, CSP headers, dependency vulnerabilities (npm audit, safety). Fix critical issues.

title: Audio engine service
description: Core audio playback service using Web Audio API and Tone.js. Handle stem loading, synchronization, speed control, looping, solo/mute functionality.

title: Set up project structure and development environment
description: Create directory structure per plan (packages/desktop, packages/web, packages/backend), set up Python 3.13 with uv, configure Electron+React+TypeScript, initialize SQLite database

title: Performance testing and optimization
description: Benchmark stem separation time, measure memory usage during processing, test with 10+ concurrent requests. Optimize bottlenecks. Target: <30s separation, <2GB RAM.

title: Documentation: Architecture, API, Deployment
description: Create docs/ARCHITECTURE.md (system design, data flow), docs/API.md (all endpoints with examples), docs/DEPLOYMENT.md (build, release, environment setup).

title: Error handling and recovery UX
description: Implement graceful error handling: backend crashes (show retry), network issues (auto-reconnect), corrupted audio (clear message), out of disk space (cleanup suggestions).

title: CI/CD pipeline
description: GitHub Actions workflows for test/build/release. Multi-platform builds (Mac/Win/Linux), automated versioning, artifact uploads.

title: Session streak tracker
description: Implement SQLite schema for sessions/streaks/achievements. Track daily practice time, consecutive days, songs practiced. Build achievement system with notifications.

title: CI/CD GitHub Actions workflows
description: Create .github/workflows: ci.yml (lint, type-check, test on PR), release.yml (build binaries, create GitHub release), test.yml (backend pytest, frontend vitest).
